title: 75 - The ETHCC Experience | Interviews with Ethereum Community Leaders
description:
Did you miss out on ETHCC? Here's the antidote to your FOMO.

David interviews 9 thought leaders and builders about the conference, Paris, and the broader Ethereum Community.
